name: Nyx Valley (Demo)
description:
A semi-open world true first-person mystery/horror game that takes you to the town of "Nyx Valley" where Eric (player) uncovers the truth behind a specific incident that wiped the whole town.

Minimum Requirements:

  • Dual-core Processor
  • 2GB RAM
  • Intel HD 4400 or better

Recommended Requirement:

  • Intel Core i3 or an equivalent Quad-core processor
  • 4GB RAM
  • Intel HD 620 or better

P.S. A huge thanks to "Eric Matyas" (soundimage.org) for providing royalty-free music to be used in game.

People keep ignoring the objectives, hence getting lost what to do. Press [Tab] from keyboard to check objectives. Read the current objective carefully, there's a keyword in every objective that gives out the location where to go. It was made in such way for players as a little puzzle. Thanks!
